articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Celtic have seemed on mission as they have thundered towards the title defence which they sealed with their slender 2-0 success against Hearts at Tynecastle. It prompted a few thoughts as they surely close in on a treble.
articles.title: Celtic-Hearts reaction: Postecoglou may have only just begun; one ginormous gulf; Naismith’s other VAR moment

articles.author: Moira Gordon
articles.description: With his eighth Premiership title now secured, Celtic captain Callum McGregor can focus on another piece of history as he attempts to become the first player in world football to win five trebles.
articles.title: The Celtic player on cusp of world first after title triumph over Hearts

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Even the footballing aesthetes must sometimes require to become artisans when the occasion demands.
articles.title: Celtic's coronation: Graft not craft at Tynecastle as King Kyogo strikes again - but so does VAR

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Celtic’s Ange Postecoglou remained entirely true to himself and did not indulge in faux modesty as he reflected on leading his club to a second consecutive title, a success that places his team within a Scottish Cup final win of a treble and a haul of five honours across his two-season tenure.
articles.title: 'Not me being arrogant, just the truth': Ange Postecoglou says he always believed he would turn Celtic around as Tynecastle experience comes full circle

articles.author: Moira Gordon
articles.description: Celtic wrapped up their 11th Premiership title in 12 years as they defeated Hearts 2-0 to chalk up their 31st league win of a dominant season in front of a packed Tynecastle.
articles.title: Celtic crowned champions while Rangers in action as win over Hearts settles title

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Celtic can clinch the Scottish Premiership title with a victory at Hearts on Sunday.
articles.title: What channel is Hearts v Celtic on? TV details, live stream, kick-off time for possible Celtic title win

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Celtic’s crowning as champions this season has been their destiny for so long it has almost felt like a birthright. The natural order.
articles.title: Why Celtic’s bejeweled league crowning puts Ange Postecoglou's side above Brendan Rodgers' and Steven Gerrard's invincibles

articles.author: Moira Gordon
articles.description: Early on in their respective careers in Scotland, there was a moment at the end of one encounter when Ange Posecoglou was pictured giving Cammy Devlin a pat on the head.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou's impact on Australian football laid bare - but that will count for nothing when Hearts host Celtic

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Celtic manager Ange Postecoglou believes the experiences enjoyed by his Asian signings in Scotland can prove “tremendously helpful” in enticing further players from that market as he backed the summer tour in the region to “broaden the club’s reach”.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou details how Celtic can recruit more Asian players and earn 'millions more supporters'

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: It almost feels cruel owing to Celtic centre-back Carl Starfelt’s Swedish nationality.
articles.title: Celtic’s Carl Starfelt has his say on the Kyogo Furuhashi v Henrik Larsson debate

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: The adulation that is being heaped on Ange Postecoglou from the Celtic faithful has rarely been witnessed in the club’s annals.
articles.title: 'I’m not in that ball-park, mate': Ange Postecoglou on Celtic adulation and why he is slow on fan walk

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Celtic’s opportunity to seal the title against Hearts at Tynecastle offers the possibility of a neat symmetry to Ange Postecoglou’s Scottish footballing odyssey.
articles.title: Time for Ange Postecoglou Celtic reflection: 'I had the energy. There was nothing hanging on to me'

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: An evocative black-and-white photo of Celtic manager Ange Postecoglou has been doing the rounds online this week.
articles.title: Celtic boss Ange Postecoglou has his say on immigrant picture of him from 52 years ago

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Celtic manager Ange Postecoglou has lamented the meddling with tradition that he sees as inherent in the kick-off time change for his club’s Scottish Cup final with Inverness Caledonian Thistle on June 3.
articles.title: 'I don't like these things being messed about': Celtic boss shows his traditionalist side and provides key update

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Score predictions for the first round of Scottish Premiership fixtures following the split – with major ramifications in the top and bottom half of the table.
articles.title: Premiership predictions: Will Hearts stop Celtic winning title? Can Aberdeen pile on Rangers misery?

articles.author: Mark Atkinson
articles.description: The Scottish Professional Football League has revealed when the fixture list for next season will be published.
articles.title: SPFL reveal when fixtures for 2023/24 will be released

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Celtic manager Ange Postecoglou has eased concerns that Cameron Carter-Vickers may miss the start of next season after undergoing knee surgery.
articles.title: Celtic reveal whether Cameron Carter-Vickers will miss the start of next season

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Celtic defender Caitlin Hayes has slammed the decision to rule out her goal in the 1-0 defeat to Rangers in the Scottish Women's Premier League on Thursday night.
articles.title: Celtic furious over Rangers turning point as defender blasts - 'sometimes you have to beat the refs'

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Rangers legend Barry Ferguson has claimed the gap to Celtic is “nowhere near as large as it’s been claimed” but has admitted that the number of signings required by Michael Beale is now in double figures.
articles.title: Rangers - Celtic gap 'nowhere near as large' as Ibrox legend makes 56 'can't happen' and signings admission

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Kyle Ure hopes leading Celtic to a Youth Cup final win over Rangers in front of a watching Ange Postecoglou can be the first step towards emulating his idol Callum McGregor.
articles.title: Celtic Youth Cup final hero aiming to follow in footsteps of Callum McGregor - 'hopefully I'm the same'

articles.author: Moira Gordon
articles.description: In July 2021, Hearts managed to sully Kyogo Furuhashi’s competitive debut for Celtic but this season’s top scorer is determined they will not stall the club’s title ambitions when they square up again this weekend.
articles.title: Kyogo Furuhashi reveals 'honour' of staying at Celtic as striker aims to keep up Hearts scoring record

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Celtic’s Matt O’Riley has urged caution in seeing footballers as public property and not people.
articles.title: 'It shouldnt be overlooked that a footballer is a person' - Celtic's Matt O'Riley appeals for better understanding

articles.author: Moira Gordon
articles.description: Hibs’ new director of football Brian McDermott played a role in scouting many of the current Celtic stars but now he wants to use his contacts and expertise to help the Easter Road side flourish.
articles.title: Brian McDermott says Celtic role prepped him for Hibs - 'all the players you see playing for them now, I watched'

articles.author: Graham Bean
articles.description: Sione Tuipulotu spent Saturday helping Glasgow Warriors reach their first European final and Sunday watching Celtic beat Rangers to book a place in the Scottish Cup equivalent.

articles.description: Celtic’s Matt O'Riley revealed he has no qualms with the later Scottish Cup final kick-off time as it means he can get a few hours extra kip before the big match.
